name: DeathMatch (itch)
description:
Beta of topdown shooter.

Choose from many guns, shields, and abilities, and battle it out with others.

Holding tab will let you see current leaderboard.

Interested in how it works? Check out Client source and Server source.

If you are downloading the local version, you'll have to extract all files and run both the server and client games.

Follow on Twitter for more fun: https://twitter.com/MenipTweet
